info.title: Nederlandse Spoorwegen
info.description: Retrieve information from the main Dutch railway operator.

get.description: List of departures for a specific station

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to use for localizing the departures list. Only a small subset of text is translated, mainly notes. Defaults to Dutch

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: NS Station code for the station to return departures for. Can be left empty if uicCode parameter is provided.

parameters.name: uicCode
parameters.description: UIC code for the station to return departures for. Can be left empty if station parameter is provided.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Departure date to show departures from. Only supported for departures at foreign stations. Defaults to server time (Europe/Amsterdam). Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339).

parameters.name: maxJourneys
parameters.description: Number of departures or departures to return. Defaults to 40

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Station name or uiccode provided in the parameters could not be found

get.description: List of arrivals for a specific station

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to use for localizing the arrivals list. Only a small subset of text is translated, mainly notes. Defaults to Dutch

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: NS Station code for the station to return arrivals for. Can be left empty if uicCode parameter is provided.

parameters.name: uicCode
parameters.description: UIC code for the station to return arrivals for. Can be left empty if station parameter is provided.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Departure date to show arrivals from.  Only supported for arrivals at foreign stations. Defaults to server time (Europe/Amsterdam)

parameters.name: maxJourneys
parameters.description: Number of departures or arrivals to return. Defaults to 40

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Station name or uiccode provided in the parameters could not be found

get.description: Returns information about a specific journey

parameters.name: train
parameters.description: Train number to return details for. Either the train number or journey identifier must be given

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Journey identifier. Can be found in as journeyDetailRef in the Trips action output. Either the train number of journey identifier must be given

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Date (as date-time in RFC3339) for this journey. Defaults to server time (Europe/Amsterdam)

parameters.name: departureUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the station that will be indicated as Departure in the output.

parameters.name: transferUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the station that will be indicated as Tranfer in the output.

parameters.name: arrivalUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the station that will be indicated as Arrival in the output.

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Information about this journey could  not be found

get.description: Returns a single trip, based on the given parameters

parameters.name: ctxRecon
parameters.description: Reconstruction context to use as basis for finding trip. Can be found in Trips output (ctxRecon)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Datetime (as date-time in RFC3339) to use when reconstructing trip, may be a different date than the trip was originally planned.

parameters.name: travelRequestType
parameters.description: Specify directions or directionsOnly to include directions for walk/bike/car legs in the result.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Name of the product that will be used in travel.

parameters.name: discount
parameters.description: Discount of travel to use when calculating product prices

parameters.name: travelClass
parameters.description: Format - int32. Class of travel to use when calculating product prices

parameters.name: API Key
parameters.description: Account details to use when querying trip assistance options

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to use for localizing the travel advice. Only a small subset of text is translated, mainly notes. Defaults to Dutch

200.description: A trip that matches the given parameters

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

419.description: Backend system failed in an unrecoverable way.

get.description: List of calamities. This operation is deprecated. Use /api/v3/disruptions instead

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to use for localizing the calamities

get.description: Returns price information for international trips

parameters.name: fromStation
parameters.description: UIC code of the origin station

parameters.name: toStation
parameters.description: UIC code of the destination station

parameters.name: departureDateTime
parameters.description: Planned departure time (as date-time in RFC3339) of the trip.

parameters.name: arrivalDateTime
parameters.description: Planned arrival time (as date-time in RFC3339) of the trip.

200.description: Information about the price to pay given the input parameters

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Stationcode provided in the parameters could not be found, or the price is unknown

get.description: Returns price information for domestic trips

parameters.name: fromStation
parameters.description: NS station code of the origin station

parameters.name: toStation
parameters.description: NS Station code of the destination station

parameters.name: travelClass
parameters.description: Travel class to return the price for

parameters.name: travelType
parameters.description: Return the price for a single or return trip. Defaults to single

parameters.name: isJointJourney
parameters.description: Set to true to return the price including joint journey discount

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Number of adults to return the price for. Defaults to 1

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: Number of children to return the price for. Defaults to 0

parameters.name: routeId
parameters.description: Specific identifier for the route to take between the two stations. This routeId is returned in the /api/v3/trips call.

parameters.name: plannedDepartureTime
parameters.description: Planned departure time (as date-time in RFC3339) of the trip. Is used to find the correct route, if multiple routes are possible between the origin and destination station.

parameters.name: plannedArrivalTime
parameters.description: Planned arrival time (as date-time in RFC3339) of the trip. Is used to find the correct route, if multiple routes are possible between the origin and destination station.

parameters.name: yearCard
parameters.description: Whether or not a yearcard should be included in price calculation.

200.description: Information about the price to pay given the input parameters

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Stationcode provided in the parameters could not be found or the price is unknown

200.description: A list of stations that can be used to plan trips

get.description: Returns a travel advice for the given parameters

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to use for localizing the travel advice. Only a small subset of text is translated, mainly notes. Defaults to Dutch

parameters.name: fromStation
parameters.description: NS station code of the origin station

parameters.name: originUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the origin station

parameters.name: originLat
parameters.description: Latitude of the origin location. Should be used together with originLng. If the origin is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng

parameters.name: originLng
parameters.description: Longitude of the origin location. Should be used together with originLat. If the origin is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng

parameters.name: originName
parameters.description: Name of the origin location. Will be returned in the response

parameters.name: toStation
parameters.description: NS station code of the destination station

parameters.name: destinationUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the destination station

parameters.name: destinationLat
parameters.description: Latitude of the destination location. Should be used together with destinationLng. If the destination is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng

parameters.name: destinationLng
parameters.description: Longitude of the destination location. Should be used together with destinationLat. If the destination is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng

parameters.name: destinationName
parameters.description: Name of the destination location. Will be returned in the response

parameters.name: viaStation
parameters.description: NS station code of the via station

parameters.name: viaUicCode
parameters.description: UIC code of the via station

parameters.name: viaLat
parameters.description: Latitude of the via location. Should be used together with viaLng. Will only be used for door-to-door trips. If the via location is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng.

parameters.name: viaLng
parameters.description: Longitude of the via location. Should be used together with viaLat. Will only be used for door-to-door trips. If the via location is a station, just provide the uicCode instead of the lat/lng.

parameters.name: originWalk
parameters.description: Return trip advices with walking options to start travel from origin to a train station (first mile)

parameters.name: originBike
parameters.description: Return trip advices with biking options to start travel from origin to a train station (first mile)

parameters.name: originCar
parameters.description: Return trip advices with car options to start travel from origin to a train station (first mile)

parameters.name: destinationWalk
parameters.description: Return trip advices with walking options to finish travel to the destination (last mile)

parameters.name: destinationBike
parameters.description: Return trip advices with biking options to finish travel to the destination (last mile)

parameters.name: destinationCar
parameters.description: Return trip advices with car options to finish travel to the destination (last mile)

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Datetime (as date-time in RFC3339) that the user want to depart from his origin or or arrive at his destination

parameters.name: searchForArrival
parameters.description: If set, the date and time parameters specify the arrival time for the trip search instead of the departure time

parameters.name: departure
parameters.description: Use searchForArrival parameter instead

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Parameter specifying that the user wants a next or previous page of the results

parameters.name: shorterChange
parameters.description: Changes the CHANGE_NOT_POSSIBLE status to CHANGE_COULD_BE_POSSIBLE if the traveler can walk twice as fast

parameters.name: addChangeTime
parameters.description: Extra time in minutes required at all transfers to change trains.

parameters.name: minimalChangeTime
parameters.description: Use addChangeTime instead

parameters.name: viaWaitTime
parameters.description: Waiting time in minutes at the via location, exclusive of transfer time

parameters.name: originAccessible
parameters.description: Use travelAssistance parameter instead

parameters.name: travelAssistance
parameters.description: Return trip advices from the trip assistance booking engine PAS

parameters.name: nsr
parameters.description: NSR number for the customer making this request. This parameter should only be provided if travelAssistance = true

parameters.name: travelAssistanceTransferTime
parameters.description: Use addChangeTime parameter instead

parameters.name: accessibilityEquipment1
parameters.description: Accessibility equipment to use when searching for trip assistance options (AVG/PAS)

parameters.name: accessibilityEquipment2
parameters.description: Accesibility equipment to use when searching for trip assistance options (AVG/PAS)

parameters.name: searchForAccessibleTrip
parameters.description: Return trip advices that are accessible. (might be bookable too)

parameters.name: filterTransportMode
parameters.description: Could be used to filter for REGIONAL_TRAINS. This parameter is replaced by the localTrainsOnly parameter

parameters.name: localTrainsOnly
parameters.description: Search only for local train options, i.e. sprinter/sneltrein/stoptrein

parameters.name: excludeHighSpeedTrains
parameters.description: Exclude high speed trains from results (including those with a required reservation)

parameters.name: excludeTrainsWithReservationRequired
parameters.description: Exclude trains for domestic trips that require a reservation (e.g. Thalys)

parameters.name: yearCard
parameters.description: Show options which are only allowed with a year card

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Name of the product that will be used in travel

parameters.name: discount
parameters.description: Discount of travel to use when calculating product prices

parameters.name: travelClass
parameters.description: Format - int32. Class of travel to use when calculating product prices

parameters.name: passing
parameters.description: Show intermediate stops that the journey passes but doesn't stop at (only works for source:HARP not multi-modal trips from negentwee)

parameters.name: travelRequestType
parameters.description: directionsOnly only plans a google directions (walk/bike/car) advice

parameters.name: API Key
parameters.description: Account details to use when querying trip assistance options

200.description: A traveladvice with zero or more trips

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

419.description: Backend system failed in an unrecoverable way.

get.description: List of disruptions relevant for the current station

parameters.name: stationCode
parameters.description: Station Code

200.description: A list of disruptions relevant for the given station

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

500.description: A list of disruptions relevant for the given station

get.description: Returns information on a single disruption/maintenance/calamity

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Disruption type for the disruption to return.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the disruption to return. Can be found using the /api/v3/disruptions call

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

404.description: Disruption not found or wrong type given

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the disruptions to be returned. If not present all types will be returned. Options are CALAMITY, DISRUPTION and MAINTENANCE and the input must be an array.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Flag to filter maintenance to only return active items, i.e. maintenance that is happening right now

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language for the disruptions. Defaults to nl. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Accept-Language for details. Please note that only the calamities will be translated, as no translation is available for maintenance and disruptions

400.description: Bad request. One or more parameters are invalid

source.description: Source system that has generated these travel advices

scrollRequestBackwardContext.description: Scroll context to use when scrolling back in time. Can be used in scrollContext query parameter

scrollRequestForwardContext.description: Scroll context to use when scrolling forward in time. Can be used in scrollContext query parameter

message.description: Optional message indicating why the list of trips is empty.

ctxRecon.description: Reconstruction context for this trip. Can be used to reconstruct this exact trip with the v3/trips/trip endpoint

plannedDurationInMinutes.description: Planned duration of this trip in minutes

actualDurationInMinutes.description: Actual duration of this trip in minutes, or the planned duration if no realtime information about this trip is available.

messages.description: List of messages regarding maintenance or disruption that influences this trip.

optimal.description: Whether or not this trip is regarded the best possible option of all returned trips

discountInCents.description: Discount price compared to total price without any discount

isSelectable.description: Denotes if the user can select this option

conditionsUrl.description: Url to webpage with common conditions

productId.description: Product ID used to buy ticket

isBestOption.description: Indicates if this price is the best option for client

AdditionalTravelTime.description: Information about the cause of the additional travel time that is expected

label.description: Human readable description of the additional travel time that is expected

shortLabel.description: Short human readable description of the additional travel time that is expected

minimumDurationInMinutes.description: Minimum expected additional travel time in minutes

maximumDurationInMinutes.description: Maximum expected additional travel time in minutes

AlternativeTransport.description: Information about the alternative transport that is available to the user

label.description: Human readable description of the alternative transport that is available to the user

shortLabel.description: Short label indicating the alternative transport that is available to the user

AlternativeTransportTimespan.description: Distinguishable timespans for alternative transport within this disruption.

BodyItem.description: Body items to render when showing this calamity

Buttons.description: Buttons to render when showing this calamity

topic.description: Topic to subscribe to in order to receive updates for this disruption.

description.description: Human readable description for this calamity

lastUpdated.description: Moment that this calamity was last updated

expectedNextUpdate.description: Expected moment that this calamity will be updated

bodyItems.description: Body items to render when showing this calamity

url.description: URL for more information about this calamity

Cause.description: Information about the cause of the disruption in this timespan

label.description: Human readable description of the cause of the disruption

local.description: A local disruption has messages tailored towards a specific station.

title.description: Title of the disruption, containing the location(s) of the disruption

titleSections.description: Title of the disruption which includes where the disruption takes place. For example: Utrecht - Gouda -Icon- Den Haag

items.description: Title of the disruption which includes where the disruption takes place. For example: Utrecht - Gouda -Icon- Den Haag

topic.description: Topic to subscribe to in order to receive updates for this disruption.

isActive.description: Whether or not this item is active, i.e. it is currently happening. For example maintenance that starts in the future has this property set to false

end.description: End time of the disruption. May be left empty if unknown

period.description: Human readable description of the period for this disruption

publicationSections.description:
Publication sections for this disruptions. Please note that these may be larger than the actual
track sections where the disruption is. This has to do with stations being recognizable for the customer.
For example, there could be a disruption between Utrecht Vaartse Rijn and Bunnik. In that case, the
trajectory could be Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, as most customers do not know where Utrecht Vaartse
Rijn and Bunnik are. In this case, the trajectory will contain Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, whereas
the disruptedTrackSection will contain Utrecht Vaartse Rijn to Bunnik

timespans.description: Distinguishable timespans within this disruption. Multiple timespans may occur for maintenance.

alternativeTransportTimespans.description: Distinguishable timespans for alternative transport within this disruption.

title.description: Title of the disruption, containing the location(s) of the disruption

topic.description: Topic to subscribe to in order to receive updates for this disruption.

isActive.description: Whether or not this item is active, i.e. it is currently happening. For example maintenance that starts in the future has this property set to false

ExpectedDuration.description: Information on the expected duration for this disruption. Is empty for maintenance

description.description: Human readable description of the expected duration of the disruption.

endTime.description: Expected end time for this disruption

PublicationSection.description:
Publication sections for this disruptions. Please note that these may be larger than the actual
track sections where the disruption is. This has to do with stations being recognizable for the customer.
For example, there could be a disruption between Utrecht Vaartse Rijn and Bunnik. In that case, the
trajectory could be Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, as most customers do not know where Utrecht Vaartse
Rijn and Bunnik are. In this case, the trajectory will contain Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, whereas
the disruptedTrackSection will contain Utrecht Vaartse Rijn to Bunnik

Situation.description: Information about the situation caused by the disruption

label.description: Human readable description of the situation caused by the disruption

Timespan.description: Distinguishable timespans within this disruption. Multiple timespans may occur for maintenance.

end.description: End time of this timespan. May be left empty if unknown

period.description: Human readable description of the period for this disruption

TitleSection.description: Title of the disruption which includes where the disruption takes place. For example: Utrecht - Gouda -Icon- Den Haag
